      void initialize(java.net.URL location, java.util.ResourceBundle resources)
      This method is data binding for connection between controller and UI.
      void renderView() 
      void skipExchangeHandler()
      This method handles skipping of card exchange
      void tradeCard()
      This method is used to update the total reinforcement based on the cards the player chooses And update the cards the player owned.
      void yourCardHandler()
      This method is used to update the cards the player owned and the cards the player chooses to exchange
      void yourTradeHandler()
      This method is used to update the cards the player owned and the cards the player chooses to exchange.
